transcript: in December, nothing was said about the war and the last battle, as though all were in a conspiracy of silence. The men who set the tone in conversation Count Rostopchin, Prince Yuri Dolgortikov, Valiiev, Count Mdrkov, and Prince Vyazemski did not show themselves at the Club, but met in private houses in inti- mate circles, and the Moscovites who took their opinions from others Ilya Rost6v among them remained for a while without any defi- nite opinion on the subject of the war and without lead
